name: Celsius
description: A refreshing blend of peach and mango flavors combined with green tea, released in 2018. Key ingredients include green tea extract, ginger extract, and guarana.

name: Monster
description: A tropical fusion of juicy mango flavor, released in 2017. Contains natural caffeine, taurine, and B vitamins for an energy boost.

name: Ghost
description: Sweet cherry meets tart lime in this energizing drink, introduced in 2019. Features natural flavors, caffeine from coffee beans, and citric acid.

name: Reign
description: A burst of melon flavor with a hint of sweetness, released in 2020. Packed with electrolytes, BCAAs, and CoQ10 to support performance.

name: Rockstar
description: Classic fruit punch flavors with a powerful punch, launched in 2015. Ingredients include ginseng, guarana, and a mix of fruit juices.

name: Redbull
description: Unique Juneberry flavor with a refreshing blue twist, new for 2021. Contains caffeine, taurine, and essential amino acids.
